title: Friends didn't receive gifts
body:
Hey guys. Yesterday I gifted two of my friends a skin worth at least 975 rp and they haven't received it. Does anyone know what went wrong? 

Kinda worried about this

Thanks

replies.body: I double checked your friend's accounts, and those two skins did go through and were added to their collections. I'd have them double check their collections for those skins, and take a screenshot showing them locked if they still can't use them.
It turns out that they did receive their skins, it just didn't show the notification. Thanks for the help!
